Html:
I assume that Microsoft is not going to set up a "formal" resource for d.ts files on the TypeScript site, so could we add a link to the excellent DefinitelyTyped github project to the "Contribute" section.

https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped

This would point new users to the best resource available so they don't have to hunt through the site or ask the same question.

Related:

- the roadmap lists a plan for a community site, for 0.9.x

http://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Roadmap

- there is a ticket for creating an external TS links page, to bridge the gap

http://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/520

The ticket has been assigned, but not yet been acted on.. Perhaps voting on it would help?
